goal.title: Goal
goal.descr: You control a spaceship in a retro arcade arena. Your objective is simple: survive waves of incoming dinosaurs and score as many points as you can.

gameplay.title: Gameplay loop
steps: Move your spaceship to dodge dinosaurs and hazards.
Shoot dinosaurs to earn points and clear the screen.
Use your shield to survive tight moments.
Use a bomb when the screen is crowded (it clears all dinosaurs).
gameplay.difficulty: The difficulty increases over time as more dinosaurs appear.
